Zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti s tovornjakom avto porinil s ceste
07 Nov 2019, 15:12 by Sijan Pretnar

V torek okoli 14.20 je 48-letni hrvaški voznik tovornjaka peljal od Staroda proti Račicam in v nevarnem ovinku zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti z zadnjim levim delom priklopnika bočno trčil v avto, s katerim se je iz nasprotne smeri pripeljal 63-letni hrvaški voznik.



Foto: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

RAČICE > Avto je prek odbojne ograje odbilo s ceste, tako da je končal prevrnjen nekaj metrov pod cesto, kjer ga je ustavilo grmovje oziroma manjše drevje. V nesreči sta se poškodovala voznik in njegova sopotnica. Sopotnici, menda hčerki voznika, so pomagali mimoidoči, tako da je na pomoč počakala v enem od avtomobilov. Voznik pa je bil pod vozilom. Na kraj so prihiteli gasilci iz Ilirske Bistrice in Podgrada, ki so zavarovali območje ter voznika rešili izpod vozila. Reševalci so nato oba oskrbeli in odpeljali v izolsko bolnišnico. Včeraj še ni bilo znano, kako hude poškodbe sta utrpela. Policisti so voznika tovornjaka oglobili. Gasilci, na kraju jih je bilo skupaj 13 iz obeh društev, so nato vozilo dvignili na cesto.


Foto: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

Due to improper speed with the truck, he pushed the car off the road
07 Nov 2019, 15:12 by Sijan Pretnar

At around 2.20pm on Tuesday, a 48-year-old Croatian truck driver drove from Starod to Racice and in a dangerous turn due to unadjusted speed, he laterally collided with his rear left-hand side of the car in a car, which drove the 63-year-old Croatian driver from the opposite direction.



Photo: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

RAČICE> The car bounced off the road through the fence, ending up overturned a few feet below the road, where bushes or smaller trees stopped it. The driver and his passenger were injured in the crash. The passenger, apparently the daughter of the driver, was assisted by a passerby by waiting for help in one of the cars. The driver, however, was under the vehicle. Firefighters from Ilirska Bistrica and Podgrad arrived to protect the area and rescue the driver from under the vehicle. The ambulance workers were then taken to the hospital in Izola. Yesterday it was not yet known how severe the injuries sustained. Police officers fined the truck driver. There were 13 firefighters on the scene, then 13 were picked up by the two companies.
